column3: utACK other than the requested change.
@theuni thanks for the feedback. I've made the change you suggested.
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->No more conflicts as of last run.
utACK the changes, thank you.\n\nPlease squash them down to a single commit though.

To avoid adding another nasty wildcard, I think this one can be $(BITCOIN_TESTS:.cpp=.cpp.log) .\n\nAlso, please append it to CLEAN_BITCOIN_TEST in Makefile.test.include instead, to keep the test stuff in one place.
